analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/44/0x7d42613c53d2a592865c6e14e06b66edcf436003.sol:
	Contract NeuralTradeToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x7d42613c53d2a592865c6e14e06b66edcf436003.sol#175-177)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

NETCrowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/44/0x7d42613c53d2a592865c6e14e06b66edcf436003.sol#287-319) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7d42613c53d2a592865c6e14e06b66edcf436003.sol#303-304)
	-token.transfer(restricted,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7d42613c53d2a592865c6e14e06b66edcf436003.sol#306-309)
	-token.transfer(referer,refererTokens) (/unique_chucks/44/0x7d42613c53d2a592865c6e14e06b66edcf436003.sol#316-319)

NETCrowdsale.hardcap should be constant (/unique_chucks/44/0x7d42613c53d2a592865c6e14e06b66edcf436003.sol#263)
